availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry M. Rust (Greenup county, Kentucky, attorney and notary public)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, attorney and notary public. Virginia native. Attorney in Pike County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Greenup County in 1860. Notary public in Greenup County.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pike County, p. 457B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, East Little Sandy, p. 835.
"Henry Madison Rust (1827-1861)," Find A Grave, Memorial 224075888, accessed November 2, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/224075888.
KYR-0001-017-0280.
